pr_title: Add glob support for extra file permissions

timeline.message: Add glob support for extra file permissions
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:GoogleContainerTools/jib into i1200-permission-globs

timeline.bodyText:
This looks good. I just think we can instantiate PathMatchers before new DirectoryWalker(...). That way, we don't have to instantiate them over and over for each file in extraDirectory. Then at least we won't instantiate them again within the same layer. This is a minor optimization, but I think it's worth, because

In practice, almost all the time, you will have some files whose permissions are not configured. That is, you'll get into this line a lot.
The optimization doesn't add new code but just amounts to moving the code outside .walk().

We could even skip path strings that aren't glob, but I think this is unnecessary and rather adds more code.
WDYT?
timeline.author: chanseokoh

timeline.bodyText: Hmm... Isn't Map<PathMatcher, Permissions> more natural? Inside walk(), you iterate over this map instead of extraDirectoryPermissions.
timeline.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Oh, yeah. Wasn't seeing it at the time but I get it now.
